product_name: Shebeest Breezer Board Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: From the bike to the beach, the Shebeest Breezer board bike shorts with removable liner shorts are 2-for-1 for multisport and apres-sport use. Nylon/spandex blend wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Front zipper with snap-closure waistband; elastic drawcord waist. Zippered back pocket holds cash and cards. Removable inner bike shorts feature an ergonomic, 4-way-stretch chamois with seamless, chafe-free comfort. Double loop system attaches liner shorts to outer Shebeest Breezer board shorts. Elastic grippers hold liner shorts in place.
short_description: From the bike to the beach, the Shebeest Breezer board bike shorts with removable liner shorts are 2-for-1 for multisport and apres-sport use.
